title: Thunderbird profile on other HDD. How to access it after Win10 crash and new setup?
content: Recently, I accidently upgraded my Win10 Home to Win11 Home. It didn't work at all, so I tried to recover my original C:\ drive with Acronis True Image 2021. That did NOT work, so I was forced to Install everything anew. Since years hence, I have my Thunderbird profile, and all my emails (some 9 GB in size), stored on a separate HDD. In my experience, MS will always just screw up the C:\ drive, and not affect other HDD's. Learned that the hard way. The profile is still safe and undisturbed on that other HDD, but I can't seem to be able to access it. It holds some important info there, like my addressbook, and licensenumbers. I am including some pics: The 'Appdata' and the 2 '.inifiles' are from the C:\ drive; the 'marked entry' is from the other HDD. It seems I have been here before: I just found a 'memo to self' pointing out that the dates of the file(s) are important.... Must have been years ago (and I'm not getting younger). Thanks on beforehand.
creator: amcw.dehaan

title: "not responding"
content: When deleting more than one email, I get the "not responding" message and a delay. Then it resumes working but it takes so long to delete email.
creator: jm.drawpro

title: Reading Outlook emails in Thunderbird
content: I have an existing Thunderbird installed with a several email accounts - mainly gmail and ISP accounts. Today I requested a new Outlook email account, I got it then I tried to include it in my Thunderbird program. I can see the initial email there but all subsequent emails are not received in T'Bird. I don't want to use the Outlook program to manage these emails. I have had a look at Outlook mail settings but can see nothing obvious there which is stopping emails being forwarded or picked up by T'Bird. I did see an article in the FAQ which says I can import emails from Outlook to T'Bird but it requires me to first install a much older version of T'Bird which I don't want to do.
creator: g.k.fib88144

title: Problem z głównym hasłem tunderbird
content: Od 2 dni nie mogę się zalogować do klięta poczty Tunderbird, główne hasło nie było zmieniane przezemnie, sprawa dotyczy jednego komputera na innych i telefonie wszystko działa. Komputer był sprawdzany pod kątem niebezpiecznego oprogramowania. Gdzie mogę podejrzeć hasło aby móc wyłączyć na stałe logowanie przy uruchamianiu programu? Odinstalowanie i ponowne zainstalowanie aplikacji nie pomogło.
creator: krzakartur

title: tutti account da ripristinare
content: stamattina thunderbird si era tutto cancellato ed era da riconfigurare (modalita nera) io non ho fatto nulla cosa è successo? chi ha detto di mettere nuova versione Avevo moltissime mail salvate sulle cartelle locali importanti adesso non ci sono piu un vero guaio
creator: romeobulsei
